text: The Maui Hesperomannia (Hesperomannia arbuscula) is a species of flowering plant in the Asteraceae family. It is found only in the United States. Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical wet low lying land forests and subtropical or tropical dry shrubland (an area with mostly bushes and few trees). It is in danger due to the loss of its natural area of habitat. ==Source== * Bruegmann, M.M. & Caraway, V. 2003. Hesperomannia arbuscula . 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 20 July 2007. Category:Asteraceae
title: Hesperomannia arbuscula
